title: Weds Post Show (10-13-21)
itunes:title: Weds Post Show (10-13-21)
description:
Bobby gives an update on the 90’s Country Draft results. Bobby also talks to Raymundo on how he is taking money to shout people out on the Sore Losers podcast. We give the verdict on whether what he’s doing is ethical or not. Eddie talks about his son’s football team that is currently undefeated and how the Macarena is back. Eddie also talks about how his childhood crush lives near him. We also run through ideas for our 100 sided dice.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
